summary: ClearForm Phase C - Organizations and Audit Logs testing complete. All 26 backend API tests passed. Frontend flows working correctly including markdown fence fix.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test users and organization ORG-DADB67A3
context_for_next_testing_agent: ClearForm Phase C (Organizations and Audit Logs) is fully functional. Organization APIs at /api/clearform/organizations/* all working. Markdown fence rendering issue has been fixed in cleanMarkdown function.
